description: Data ingestion script converting a STAC catalog to data on disk.
name: stac-ingress

optional_parameters.description: API Key for accessing the STAC endpoint
optional_parameters.name: stac-api-key

optional_parameters.description: Don't actually download the retrieved imagery
optional_parameters.help_text: If set to '1' this algorithm will use the '--dryrun' flag on any aws commands, meaning that no data will be copied locally.
optional_parameters.name: dry-run

outputs.description: Directory where images / data have been written.
outputs.name: output-dir

required_parameters.description: Spatial bounds of the Area of Interest (AOI).
required_parameters.help_text: The AOI bounds should be in the form: '[min_lon, min_lat, max_lon, max_lat]'
required_parameters.name: aoi-bounds

required_parameters.description: Only retrieve images with timestamps within the specified start and end date.
required_parameters.help_text: Date range should be in the form: '["start_date", "end_date"]' where "start_date" and "end_date" are UTC formatted date/timestamps.
required_parameters.name: date-range

required_parameters.description: URL for the STAC API endpoint
required_parameters.name: stac-api-url

required_parameters.description: Directory where output images / data will be written.  Will be created if it doesn't already exist.
required_parameters.name: output-dir

required_parameters.description: List of STAC collections to retrieve results from
required_parameters.display_name: Search within these specified STAC collections
required_parameters.name: collections
